results.name: URL Disclosure
results.deatils: The decompilation of the source code could lead to the disclosure of private URLs.

results.name: Generic Exception in catch
results.deatils: Exception catching should be specific. Generic Exception type could not be safe and lead to silent error suppresion

results.name: Generic Exception in Throws
results.deatils: The exceptions thrown by a method should be specific. Generic Exception type could could not be safe and lead to silent error suppresion.

results.name: Hidden fields
results.deatils: Hidden fields are often used to cover data from the user, but they are discouraged, since they can lead to data disclosure.

results.name: IP Disclosure
results.deatils: The decompilation of the source code could lead to the disclosure of private IPs.

results.name: Math Random method
results.deatils: This method is not as random as it is supossed to be. It should not be use to generate OTP codes.

results.name: Unchecked output in Logs
results.deatils: Sensitive information should never be logged since it can lead to that information being disclosed.

results.name: Hardcoded file separator
results.deatils: Paths like C:\\Program Files\\... can cause problems, and are considered vulnerabilities, since some OSs use backslashes `\\` (DOS/Windows) and others slashes `/` (Unix).

results.name: Weak Algorithms
results.deatils: Using weak algorithms allows an attacker to break the cyphered communications gaining access to plain text content.

results.name: Sleep Method
results.deatils: Sleep Method is used with vars as arguments. If those vars are modified it could force the aplication to stop indefinitely.

results.name: World readable permissions
results.deatils: Setting world readable permissions allows to anyone (with access to the target file) to read file content.

results.name: World writable permissions
results.deatils: Setting world writable permissions allows to anyone (with access to the target file) to modify file content.

results.name: Write-Read in external storage
results.deatils: Application can read/write in external storage. Any app can read data written in external storage.

results.name: Temp File Use
results.deatils: Applications is creating temp files. Sensitive information should never be written in temp files.

results.name: WebView XSS
results.deatils: Webview insecure implementation. This issue could allow to a remote attacker to code execution in WebView and performing Cross Site Scripting attacks.

results.name: WebView ignores SSL errors
results.deatils: WebView is ignoring SSL errors and it accepts any SSL certificate. This application could be affected by Man in the Middle attacks.

results.name: SQL injection
results.deatils: This application is vulnerable to SQL injection. Any data stored in database can be exposed as any attacker is able to retrive, modify and delete the stored information.

results.name: Accepting all SSL certificates
results.deatils: Insecure application SSL implementation. This application accepts all certificates, including self signed by default. This is a critical issue as Man in the Middle attacks may be performed.

results.name: Sending sms-mms
results.deatils: This application is sending sms or mms and it might be without the user's knowledge.

results.name: Super user privileges.
results.deatils: This applications may require super user privileges.

results.name: Rooted device detection
results.deatils: This applications is performing checks for rooted device. This could be use to execute specific code if the device is rooted to take control of it.

results.name: Cell Location (Base Stations)
results.deatils: This app is using cell location by Base Station method. This process might be performed without the user's knowledge.

results.name: Get Device ID
results.deatils: The application is recording the device ID (IMEI). This process might be performed without the user's knowledge.

results.name: Get SIM Serial
results.deatils: The application is recording the SIM serial. This process might be performed without the user's knowledge.

results.name: GPS location
results.deatils: This app is using cell location by GPS method. This process might be performed without the user's knowledge.

results.name: Base64 Encode
results.deatils: This application is using Base64 encoding. This is not a secure method to encode data.

results.name: Base64 decode
results.deatils: This application is using Base64 decoding.

results.name: Infinite Loop
results.deatils: The application contains infinite loops. It is not a good practice to use infinite loops inside a program.

results.name: Email disclosure
results.deatils: The decompilation of the source code could lead to the disclosure of private email information.

results.name: Certificate or Keystore disclosure
results.deatils: The decompilation of the source code could lead to the disclosure of hardcoded certificate or keystore.

results.name: Get SIM Operator
results.deatils: The application is recording the device network operator. This process might be performed without the user's knowledge.

results.name: Get SIM OperatorName
results.deatils: The application is recording the device network operator name. This process might be performed without the user's knowledge.

results.name: Obfuscated code
results.deatils: The code of this application could be obfuscated.

results.name: System command execution
results.deatils: The application could execute system command.

results.name: SSL getInsecure method
results.deatils: Insecure application SSL implementation. This applications in using the getInsecure Method which returns a new instance of a socketFactory with all SSL security checks disabled. These sockets are vulnerable to MITM attacks.

results.name: Finally with return statement
results.deatils: Finally structure with return statement inside will bypass any error thrown.

results.name: Sleep Method
results.deatils: Sleep Method is used with vars as arguments. If those vars are modified it could force the aplication to stop indefinitely.
